bibl.title: The Performance and Readership of the Persai of Timotheus.
bibl.note: The importance of the papyrus (written in the earlier part of the fourth century B.C.) and the poem it contains in their unique historical contexts. - Pp. 259-260: Appendix. Timotheus, Persai, column V (lines 186-253 Wil. = 173-240 Page).
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, The Performance and Readership of the Persai of Timotheus.
